name: CarryoverSecret Preview
author: Mero
info: Do you have a Secret Carryover and have no idea how to show the player that something happen and it is not a bug? Well fear not. With this script you now have a way!
description: This script stops ghost.zh scripts from executing. "optional" as well as draws a preview of the specified screen. "Level Palette will be ignored."
setup: Step 1: Set the WAIT_TIME Constant. Or leave it at 84 which is what I used.Step 2: Make a Preview ScreenStep 3: Place a ffc on the screen that triggers the carryover to the other screen. And set it's d attributes as follows.d0: Map with the prevew screen. NOT DMap.d1: Preview Screen in decimal format with the secret applied or being applied which ever you prefer.d2: Bitmap to use values 0-5 "Bitmaps 1 through 6 respectfully" d3: The time in frames that it takes the secret to trigger "optional"
